plot: Pistol, Suitcase and Three stinking barrels is a gangster comedy which tells the story of the 23-year-old student Anton, a.k.a "The Beautiful". He has a dream but in order for it to come ...
title: Pistolet, Kufar i 3 smurdyashti varela
